text.div:
BCHealthClientIdentityManagement

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hlth.gov.bc.ca/fhir/client/ImplementationGuide/fhir.ca-bc.client

FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Client Registry

name: BCHealthClientIdentityManagement
title: BC Client Registry FHIR Implementation Guide
description: FHIR Implementation Guide for BC MOH Client Registry

grouping.name: Capability Statement
grouping.description: The Capability Statement for Client Registry

grouping.name: Supporting Profiles
grouping.description: Artifacts associated with resources that support Patient and Client Registry Operations

grouping.name: Request Examples
grouping.description: A set of operation request examples

grouping.name: Response Examples
grouping.description: A set of operation response examples

resource.name: AddRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry for Add Patient requests.

resource.name: AddResponseBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry response to Add Patient requests.

resource.name: ClientRegistryPatient
resource.description: General constraints on the Patient resource for use in the BC Client Registry project.

resource.name: FindCandidatesRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Find Candidates Operation request.

resource.name: GetDemographicsRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Get Demographics Operation request.

resource.name: MergeRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry for Add Patient requests.

resource.name: MergeResponseBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry response to Merge Patient requests.

resource.name: MetadataParametersIn
resource.description: Parameters profile for BC meta data - incoming messages.

resource.name: MetadataParametersOut
resource.description: Parameters profile for BC meta data - outbound messages.

resource.name: PatientByExample
resource.description: General constraints on the Patient resource for use in the BC Client Registry project for queries.

resource.name: ReviseRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry for Revise Patient requests.  This is also used by Patient Notitifications.

resource.name: ReviseResponseBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry response to Revise Patient requests.

resource.name: SearchResponseBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry response to Find Candidates and Get Demographics queries.

resource.name: SearchWithEligibilityResponseBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry response to Get Demographics with Eligibility queries.

resource.name: UpdateRequestBundle
resource.description: A Bundle that is used in the Client Registry for Patient update requests.

resource.name: BC Birth Date History
resource.description: This extension allows the Client Registry to include historical birth dates in a single Patient resource.

resource.name: BC Business Dates
resource.description: The effective dates for the parent element.

resource.name: BC Death Date History
resource.description: This extension allows the Client Registry to include historical death dates and flags in a single Patient resource.

resource.name: BC Death Verified Flag
resource.description: The Patients death is verified and as recorded in the Client Registry as a flag.  This also includes death verified flag history as required.

resource.name: BC Death Verified Flag History
resource.description: This extension allows the Client Registry to include historical death flags in a single Patient resource.

resource.name: BC Gender History
resource.description: This extension allows the Client Registry to include historical gender codes in a single Patient resource.

resource.name: BC Gender Identity with business dates.
resource.description: Gender Identity with business dates.

resource.name: BC Identifier Status
resource.description: Identifier status.

resource.name: BC Merge Status Code
resource.description: A code that represents the Merge status of the Patient.

resource.name: BC Multiple Birth History
resource.description: This extension allows the Client Registry to include historical multiple birth values in a single Patient resource.

resource.name: BC SourceID and UserID
resource.description: Identifiers for the source and user that modified the specific element that this extension is on.

resource.name: BC Address Validation Status Code
resource.description: A code that represents the validation status of the address

resource.name: BC Address Type Value Set
resource.description: BC Address Type value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

resource.name: BC Address Validation Value Set
resource.description: BC Address Validation value set used to describe the validation status of an address

resource.name: BC Contact Point System Value Set
resource.description: BC Contact Point System value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

resource.name: BC Contact Point Use Value Set
resource.description: BC Contact Point Use value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

resource.name: BC Identifier Status Value Set
resource.description: BC Identifier Status value set used to describe the status of an identifier.

resource.name: BC Merge Status Value Set
resource.description: BC Merge Status value set used to describe the merge status of a Patient.

resource.name: BC Name Use value set.
resource.description: BC Name Use value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

resource.name: BC Client Registry Address Validation Status Code
resource.description: Codes used to define the address validation status.

resource.name: BC Client registry identifier status code system
resource.description: BC Client registry identifier status code system.

resource.name: BC Client Registry merge status.
resource.description: Codes used to describe the merge status.

resource.name: BC Client Registry Operation Outcome details code system
resource.description: BC Client Registry Operation Outcome details code system

resource.name: Bundle-AddPatient-Newborn-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $AddPatient operation for a newborn.

resource.name: Bundle-AddPatient-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $AddPatient operation.

resource.name: Bundle-AddPatient-Response-Example
resource.description: A sample AddPatient Operation response.

resource.name: Bundle-FindCandidates-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of FindCandidates response Bundle.  Patient0 has PHN, alternate, SRI and SSRI identifier examples.

resource.name: Bundle-FindCandidates-Response-MomsPHN-Example
resource.description: Example of FindCandidates with mother's PHN response Bundle.

resource.name: Bundle-FindCandidates-UsingMomsPHN-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $FindCandidates operation with Mother's PHN.

resource.name: Bundle-FindCandidatesByExample-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $FindCandidates operation

resource.name: Bundle-GetDemographics-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics operation

resource.name: Bundle-GetDemographics-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics operation response Bundle

resource.name: Bundle-GetDemographicsWithEligibility-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics.withEligibility operation response Bundle

resource.name: Bundle-MergePatient-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $MergePatient operation.

resource.name: Bundle-MergePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: A sample MergePatient Operation response.

resource.name: Bundle-RevisePatient-Request-Example
resource.description: Example of $RevisePatient operation.

resource.name: Bundle-RevisePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: A sample RevisePatient Operation response.

resource.name: Bundle-UpdatePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: A sample UpdatePatient Operation response.

resource.name: Coverage-Active-Example
resource.description: Example of Get Eligibility response, the patient is eligible.

resource.name: Coverage-InActive-Example
resource.description: Example of Get Eligibility response, the patient is not eligible.

resource.name: MothersPHN-RelatedPerson-ForFC
resource.description: RelatedPerson, representing Mother, for Find Candidate Operation by mother's PHN

resource.name: OperationOutcome-Example
resource.description: Example OperationOutcome for a Client Registry Add, Revise or Merge.

resource.name: OperationOutcome-Example-RP
resource.description: Example OperationOutcome for a Client Registry Revise Patient.

resource.name: OperationOutcome-Search-Example
resource.description: Example OperationOutcome for a Client Registry Search

resource.name: Parameters-AddPatient-Example
resource.description: Example of $AddPatient parameters.

resource.name: Parameters-AddPatient-Newborn-Example
resource.description: Example of $RevisePatient.Newborn operation where the Patient is a newborn.

resource.name: Parameters-AddPatient-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of Add response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-DeletePatch-Example
resource.description: An example of a delete patch, which is used for a partial update of a Patient resource.  This example deletes a physical address.

resource.name: Parameters-FindCandidates-Example
resource.description: Example of $FindCandidates search parameters.

resource.name: Parameters-FindCandidates-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of $FindCandidates response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-GetDemographics-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics operation

resource.name: Parameters-GetDemographics-IN-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics operation, IN parameters

resource.name: Parameters-GetDemographics-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-GetDemographicsWithEligibility-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics.withEligibility operation

resource.name: Parameters-GetDemographicsWithEligibility-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of $GetDemographics.withEligibility response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-MergePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of Merge response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-MergePatient-TwoNonSurvivors-Example
resource.description: Example of $MergePatient operation.

resource.name: Parameters-RevisePatient-Example
resource.description: Example of $RevisePatient operation that updates an existing Patient

resource.name: Parameters-RevisePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of Revise response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Parameters-UpdatePatient-Example
resource.description: Example of $RevisePatient operation that updates an existing Patient

resource.name: Parameters-UpdatePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of Update response Metadata parameters

resource.name: Patient-0-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for query response Bundle with 4 different kinds of identifiers: SRI-PHN, SRI, SSRI and alternative.

resource.name: Patient-1-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for query response Bundle

resource.name: Patient-2-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for query response Bundle

resource.name: Patient-AddPatient-Example
resource.description: The Patient is completely new to the Client Registry, no identifiers.

resource.name: Patient-AddPatient-Newborn-Example
resource.description: The Patient is completely new to the Client Registry, no identifiers.

resource.name: Patient-AddReviseOrMergePatient-Response-Example
resource.description: Example of Merge or Revise response Bundle with 4 different kinds of identifiers: SRI-PHN, SRI, SSRI and alternative.

resource.name: Patient-BabyBoy-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient newborn for query response Bundle

resource.name: Patient-BabyGirl-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient newborn for query response Bundle

resource.name: Patient-By-Example-Example
resource.description: An example of a Patient used for Find Candidates query.

resource.name: Patient-By-Example-GD-Example
resource.description: An example of a Patient used for Get Demographics query.

resource.name: Patient-GetDemographics-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for $GetDemographics operation response

resource.name: Patient-GetDemographics-withHistory-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for $GetDemographics operation response

resource.name: Patient-Identifier-Examples
resource.description: An example of a Patient with descriptive Identifier.

resource.name: Patient-MergePatient-Example
resource.description: Example of a merge patient Patient

resource.name: Patient-Mother-Example
resource.description: Example of Patient for query response Bundle

resource.name: Patient-RevisePatient-Example
resource.description: Patient example for a RevisePatient operation

resource.name: RelatedPerson-Mother-Example
resource.description: Example of related person's PHN as Identifier

resource.name: RelatedPerson-MotherOfBabyBoy-Example
resource.description: Example of related person who is the mother

resource.name: RelatedPerson-MotherOfBabyGirl-Example
resource.description: Example of related person who is the mother

resource.name: HCIMCapabilityStatementClient
resource.description: This capability statement describes the use cases that are supported by the BC FHIR implementation of the Client Registry when it is acting as a client. I.e. sending notifications.

resource.name: HCIMCapabilityStatementServer
resource.description: This capability statement describes the use cases that are supported by the BC FHIR implementation of the Client Registry when it is acting as a server.

resource.name: AddPatient
resource.description: This operation is used for newborns or to 'force create' a patient.

resource.name: FindCandidates
resource.description: This operation is used to query for a patient.  The response can contain 0 or more Patients.

resource.name: GetDemographics
resource.description: This operation is used to query for a patient.  The response can contain 0 or 1 Patient.

resource.name: GetDemographics.withEligibility
resource.description: This operation is used to query for a patient.  The response can contain 0 or 1 Patient and the insurance eligibility.

resource.name: MergePatient
resource.description: This operation is used to merge patients.

resource.name: PatientNotification
resource.description: This operation is used notify a user that a patient's record has changed.

resource.name: RevisePatient
resource.description: This operation is used to revise a patient's demographics.

resource.name: UpdatePatient
resource.description: This operation is used to revise a patient's demographics, applied to only specific Patient attributes.

page.title: Transition from V3 Provider to FHIR
